mapper.update:
update dj_sysqxx
QYMC = #{qymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NSRSBH = #{nsrsbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DQDM = #{dqdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XM = #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where QYID = #{qyid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and SEWBZ = #{sewbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dj_sysqxx WHERE DATE(DJSJ)>=DATE_SUB( #{fssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND #{fssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}>DATE(DJSJ)
